1_1JtxPipMFzvBTQ8fwSeupUxfiVMbutBfhG.body:
It is forbidden to discharge semen in vain. This is a graver sin than any other mentioned in the Torah. Those who practice masturbation they commit a grave sin and it is equivalent to killing a person.
Circumcision with early genital pain contribute to the proper encoding of the brain and sexual self-control. Circumcised boys commit less frequently the masturbation sin.
